definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: We need a strong farm hand.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个强壮的田间能手。

sentences.english: The laborers home from their fields spread their mats in the courtyards.
sentences.chinese: 劳动的人们从田间归来，把席子展铺在院子里。

sentences.english: The single grain selection is better for the preharvest sprouting rate in the selective breeding application.
sentences.chinese: 在选择育种中，田间穗上发芽率以单粒选为好。

sentences.english: Field contrast experiments were done among every poplar clones.
sentences.chinese: 对各无性系进行了田间对比试验。

sentences.english: It was raining heavily. They went on working in the fields, however.
sentences.chinese: 天在下着大雨，然而他们继续在田间劳动。

sentences.english: Otherfield management measures did not show significant effect to inhabit A.
sentences.chinese: 其他田间管理措施对抑制黄曲霉繁殖没有明显效果。

sentences.english: When their linseed is ripe for harvest the hemp is in bloom in our field.
sentences.chinese: 他们的亚麻籽成熟收获时，我们田间的大麻正在开花。

sentences.english: The next day the people of Shechem went out to the fields, and this was reported to Abimelech.
sentences.chinese: 次日，民出到田间，有人告诉亚比米勒。

sentences.english: It is suitable to use 1500 times diluents in the field.
sentences.chinese: 该药剂田间使用以1500倍液为宜。

sentences.english: Artificial inoculation techniques for false smut of rice (caused by Ustilaginoidea virens (Cooke) Takahashi) was studied under field condition.
sentences.chinese: 探索在田间条件下进行稻曲病的人工接种技术。

sentences.english: The first signs are little holes in parks and fields.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，在公园或田间地头会出现小小的洞穴。

sentences.english: Are the trees of the field people, that you should besiege them?
sentences.chinese: 田间的树木岂是人，叫你糟蹋吗？

sentences.english: The wind blows, the moonlight shines on the ground,the frogs croak and insects chirp in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙呱呱的叫声，和田间昆虫啾唧之声混合在一起。

sentences.english: The experiment in field proves that a part of extraction substance has a good effect on killing-insect.
sentences.chinese: 田间杀虫试验证明其中一部位有良好的杀虫效果。

sentences.english: Staggered the same path in the field, between the villages can hear the voice of the crow like dogs.
sentences.chinese: 田间小路交错相通，村落间能听到鸡鸣狗叫的声音。

sentences.english: Objective To excogitate Alisma orientate(Sam. ) Juzep. flower bolt Cultivating and standardization cultivating technology of field planting management.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出泽泻花苔培育与田间规范化栽培管理技术。

definition: embankment or foothpath between paddy fields
lines on ridges on ploughed field
(of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
